name: VanGoghFacts
0:
”Alexa, open van gogh facts”
”Alexa, start van gogh facts”
”Alexa, ask van gogh facts for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: van gogh facts
des:
Find out about everybody's favourite artist Van Gogh and Ask Alexa for an interesting list of facts about him. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.

Find out about when Van Gogh was born, how he died, why he cut off his ear, and why he only sold one painting during his life time.
This skill was brought to you by Fabulous Masterpieces. We specialise in hand painting fine art replicas of your favourite paintings onto canvas. To view our artwork visit - https://www.fabulousmasterpieces.co.uk/
